Extractors#

Optional feature extractors to use in place of default NatureCNN. Models are passed through an algorithms policy_kwargs.

Methods#

from tmbot.extras.extractors import custom_extractor_policy
tmbot.extras.extractors.custom_extractor_policy(model: ~torch.nn.modules.module.Module = <class 'tmbot.extras.extractors.SimpleCNN'>, model_kwargs: ~typing.Dict[str, ~typing.Any] | None = None, frame_extractor: ~stable_baselines3.common.torch_layers.BaseFeaturesExtractor = <class 'tmbot.extras.extractors.CustomFrameExtractor'>, frame_output_dim=512)#

Wrapper function for creating custom feature extractor for the frame observation. Allows observation to be handled by a custom nn.Module object.

Parameters:

  • model (nn.Module) – Function returning nn.Module object given n_input_channels. Used by CustomFrameExtractor by default to extract data from frame observation space. May or may not be used by custom implementations. By default returns NatureCNN as defined by SB3.

  • model_kwargs (dict[str, Any]) – Keyword arguments passed to model.

  • frame_extractor (BaseFeaturesExtractor) – Features extractor extracting data from frame observation space. CustomFrameExtractor by default.

Returns:

Keyword arguments for policy.

Return type:

policy_kwargs (dict[str, Any])


from tmbot.extras.extractors import ExtCombinedExtractor
tmbot.extras.extractors.ExtCombinedExtractor.__init__(self, observation_space: ~gymnasium.spaces.dict.Dict, frame_output_dim: int = 256, normalized_image: bool = False, frame_extractor: ~stable_baselines3.common.torch_layers.BaseFeaturesExtractor = <class 'tmbot.extras.extractors.CustomFrameExtractor'>, model: ~torch.nn.modules.module.Module = None, model_kwargs: ~typing.Dict[str, ~typing.Any] | None = None)#

Modified CombinedExtractor() to be used with MultiInputPolicy allowing for custom frame space models.

Parameters:

  • observation_space (spaces.Dict) – Dictionary observation space to be used.

  • frame_output_dim (int) – Output features of frame feature extractor. Default is 256.

  • normalized_image (bool) – Whether image is already normalized. Default is False.

  • frame_extractor (BaseFeaturesExtractor) – Feature extractor for frame observation. Default is CustomFrameExtractor.

  • model (nn.Module) – Model for frame feature extraction. A CNN is recommended. Default is NatureCNN.

  • model_kwargs (dict[str, Any]) – Keyword arguments for frame extractor model. Default is None.


from tmbot.extras.extractors import SimpleCNN
tmbot.extras.extractors.SimpleCNN.__init__(self, n_input_channels: int, layers: list[dict], activation: Module = ReLU())#

Simple CNN architecture with customizable attributes. Not intended to be invoked directly, done by ExtCombinedExtractor.

Parameters:

  • n_input_channels (int) – Number of input channels.

  • layers (list[dict]) – A list where each element corresponds to nn.Conv2d keyword arguments.

  • activation (nn.Module) – Activation function between each convolutional layer.
